title: Morton Schindel: from page to screen
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, John Schindel and Alexander Cochran
brief_description: Morton Schindel describes the production of animated versions of children’s books by Western Woods Studios. Intended for filmmakers, children’s literature specialists, teachers and librarians.
